alert.note: Alert for Southeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 09 at 7:57PM AKST until December 10 at 10:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 10 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Visibility reduced to one half mile or less at times. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. East winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Cordova. * WHEN...From noon to 10 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous travel. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and gusty easterly winds will develop midday Sunday and intensify Sunday afternoon and evening. Snow will initially be fairly dry and will blow around easily. Temperatures will rise to around or a bit above freezing by Sunday evening, which should diminish the threat from blowing snow. Snow will mix with or change to rain overnight Sunday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
